result.execSummary:
The defendant Dennis E Lang was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to COCC within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will be a judgment.
$100 domestic abuse surcharge to COCC.  60 days to pay or set payment plan.  Failure to pay is a judgment.
May not possess or use firearms.
No contact with Ruby Tango except as directed by family court & as necessary to proceed thru the divorce process.

Must provide DNA sample.

Must complete a domestic abuse assessment & comply with recommendations.

Must follow rules of Probation.

timeConds.notes:
Banked for use by probation.
Subject to good time.  No work release.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
